snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. Mother, Momma Gail, wife, ex-wife, daughter, caregiver, healer, interior decorator, designer, table-scaper, poet, Sinatra lover, Sondheim fan, friend, champion of the underdog, actor, model, story teller, "oner," consummate New Yorker! I miss you, dear Mom, now and forever a blessed memory. Love, Evan 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. I miss you, dear Mom, now and forever a blessed memory. Love, Evan 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIDMAN, GAIL ANN LOWE
